creator: Gowanlock, Theresa, d.1899. (author)
Delaney, Theresa Mary Fulford, 1865?-1913. (author)
description: Gowanlock, Theresa: d.1899. Widow of a settler killed in the massacre of Duck Lake (Saskatoon Herald, September 27, 1999). // Delaney, Theresa Mary Fulford: 1865?-1913. Widow of a settler killed in the massacre at Frog Lake, 1885; prisoner of Big Bear's Cree band for some weeks; died at Aylmer, Quebec. // Also published, Parkdale, Ont.: Times Office, 1885 (130, [6]p.); New York: Garland Pub., 1976 (141p.); with introduction by Sarah Carter, Regina: Canadian Plains Research Center, University of Regina, 1999 (xxxiii, 78p.). Accounts by the two women survivors of the Frog Lake Massacre; Delaney wrote part 2. Some copies have extra illustrations.
